text: today I'm sharing with you must have
grilling tips I'm gonna start here
getting a nice hot sear with steaks so
in front of me I have a 10 ounce strip
steak here this is about an inch in
thickness and what I'm gonna do first
I'm going to keep my grill pan or heat
your grill up to a nice medium-high heat
take a paper towel with a little bit of
NOLA oil grapeseed oil any neutral oil
that can go to a high heat and you want
to brush your grades of your grill with
this oil so my grill is nice and hot and
I'm going to place my steak on a
diagonal so I get some nice grill marks
so it's been about two minutes I'm gonna
rotate the steak now so that I get those
wonderful grill marks and another two
minutes before I flip it on its other
side you can see that it has really nice
grill marks here and again we're gonna
do another two minutes and then we're
going to shift it in another two minutes
more I'm going to take my steak off of
the grill and transfer this now to an
indirect heat now since I'm indoors
indirect heat mean with the oven but if
you're using a gas grill or a charcoal
grill you're gonna want to ship the heat
to the exterior of your grill and you
finish cooking the steak in the center
of the grill who creates almost like the
oven to finish cooking with these great
grilling tips you'll be able to grill
steak like a pro in the summer enjoy
